intro_text: p_l thinks r_c is, well, really, just - uh, just swell, and {PRONOUN/p_l/subject} {VERB/p_l/think/thinks} r_c might like {PRONOUN/p_l/object} too. {PRONOUN/p_l/subject/CAP}{VERB/p_l/'ve/'s} been building up {PRONOUN/p_l/poss} confidence, and {PRONOUN/p_l/subject}{VERB/p_l/'re/'s} going to ask r_c to spend some time together, just the two of them, this afternoon!
decline_text: Unfortunately, r_c is sent on an afternoon border patrol before p_l can say anything.

success_outcomes.text: r_c agrees to the walk, tail-tip twitching with excitement. It's a feeling p_l openly mirrors, ears forward, pelt prickling with anxiety in the best way as they pad through the forest together, the shifting dappled light beneath the canopy a green-tinted backdrop to the excitement of this budding dynamic to their relationship.

log.cats_from: from_cat and to_cat took a romantic stroll in the greenleaf sun together.

success_outcomes.text: All of p_l's bravery is rewarded when r_c says yes! The pair head out for their romantic stroll, the buzz of excitement in their hearts merging with the buzz of life in the green-lit forest, shyly sharing glances between one another.

log.cats_from: from_cat and to_cat took a romantic stroll in the greenleaf sun together.

success_outcomes.text: s_c has always had a skilled tongue, but it's rarely ever felt this important to choose {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} words carefully. It's all worth it to hear r_c's 'yes.' Their stroll together is awkward with the new tension of acknowledged romance, but neither cat would change it for the world.

log.cats_from: s_c's social adeptness made {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} romantic greenleaf stroll with r_c all the better.

fail_outcomes.text: p_l awkwardly stutters {PRONOUN/p_l/poss} way through asking r_c out - and {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/say/says} no. It's gentle, but it's a no. Tail tucked, p_l slinks off to be alone.

log.cats_from: p_l felt embarrassed when r_c rejected {PRONOUN/p_l/poss} offer of a romantic stroll.
r_c felt awkward when p_l asked {PRONOUN/r_c/object} out on a romantic stroll, and r_c rejected the offer.
